    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static boolean Vert3.approxCoord​(Vert3 a, Vert3 b)
    Tests to see if two vertices share the same coordinate according to the default tolerance, IUtils.EPSILON.

    Tests to see if two vertices share the same coordinate according to a tolerance.

    Compares this vertex to another.

    Gets a vertex from the mesh.
    static Quaternion Vert3.orientation​(Vert3 vert, Handedness handedness, Quaternion target)
    Returns the orientation of the vertex as a quaternion based on the vertex's normal.
    static Transform3 Vert3.orientation​(Vert3 vert, Handedness handedness, Transform3 target)
    Returns the orientation of the vertex as a transform based on the vertex's normal.
    static Ray3 Vert3.orientation​(Vert3 vert, Ray3 target)
    Returns the orientation of the vertex as a ray based on the vertex's normal and coordinate.
    Edge3 Edge3.set​(Vert3 origin, Vert3 dest)
    Sets this edge by vertex.
    Face3 Face3.set​(Vert3... vertices)
    Sets this face's vertices to refer to a an array of vertices.

    Constructor Description
